tool_description: Ask a question and get an answer. Example: When did World War two end? answer -  September 2, 1945
title: Question-Answered

api_list.name: Get Answer to Question
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches the answer to a single question.

required_parameters.name: questionAsked
required_parameters.default: how far away is the sun from earth?

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://question-answered.p.rapidapi.com/question/{questionasked}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "question-answered.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
